commit.message: fix: remove (redundant) semicolon in lint suggestion

files.patch:
@@ -2,27 +2,27 @@ error: unchecked subtraction of a 'Duration' from an 'Instant'

    = note: `-D clippy::unchecked-duration-subtraction` implied by `-D warnings`
